verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Prisoner <S%G1198><s%> Of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brother, <S%G80><s%> To Philemon <S%G5371><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beloved <S%G27><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Our <S%G4904><s%> Fellow Worker <S%G2257><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> To Apphia <S%G682><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Beloved, <S%G27><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Archippus <S%G751><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4961><s%> Our Fellow Soldier, <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> ' In <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3624><s%> Thy House <S%G4675><s%> Assembly : <S%G1577><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Our Father <S%G2257><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

I Thank <S%G2168><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> My God, <S%G3450><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> Mention <S%G3417><s%> Of Thee <S%G4675><s%> Making <S%G4160><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4335><s%> My Prayers, <S%G3450><s%>

Hearing <S%G191><s%> Of Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Hast <S%G2192><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saints, <S%G40><s%>

So That <S%G3704><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fellowship <S%G2842><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Of Thy Faith <S%G4675><s%> Efficient <S%G1756><s%> May Become <S%G1096><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Acknowledge <S%G1922><s%> Of Every <S%G3956><s%> Good Thing <S%G18><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Thankfulness <S%G5485><s%> <S%G5484><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Encouragement <S%G3874><s%> By Occasion Of <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G26><s%> Thy Love, <S%G4675><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bowels <S%G4698><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Saints <S%G40><s%> Have Been Refreshed <S%G373><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%> Brother. <S%G80><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Boldness <S%G3954><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> To Order <S%G2004><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> What Is <S%G3588><s%> Becoming, <S%G433><s%>

For The Sake Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> I Exhort, <S%G3870><s%> Such A One <S%G5108><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Paul The <S%G3972><s%> Aged, <S%G4246><s%> <S%G3570><s%> And Now <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Prisoner <S%G1198><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Once <S%G4218><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Unserviceable, <S%G890><s%> <S%G3570><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Me <S%G1698><s%> Serviceable : <S%G2173><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Was Desiring 1014 V-INI-1S With 4314 PREP Myself 1683 F-1ASM To Keep, 2722 V-PAN That 2443 CONJ For 5228 PREP Thee 4675 P-2GS He Might Serve 1247 V-PAS-3S Me 3427 P-1DS In 1722 PREP The 3588 T-DPM Bonds 1199 N-DPM Of The 3588 T-GSN Glad Tidings; 2098 N-GSN

<S%G5565><s%> But Apart From <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4674><s%> Thy Mind <S%G1106><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> I Wished <S%G2309><s%> To Do, <S%G4160><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> <S%G2596><s%> Of Necessity <S%G318><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G18><s%> Thy Good <S%G4675><s%> Might Be, <S%G5600><s%> But <S%G235><s%> <S%G2596><s%> Of Willingness : <S%G1595><s%>

<S%G5029><s%> For Perhaps <S%G1063><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> He Was Separated From Thee <S%G5563><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> A Time, <S%G5610><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Eternally <S%G166><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Thou Mightest Possess; <S%G568><s%>

No Longer <S%G3765><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Bondman, <S%G1401><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Above <S%G5228><s%> A Bondman, <S%G1401><s%> A Brother <S%G80><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> Specially <S%G3122><s%> To Me, <S%G1698><s%> <S%G4214><s%> And How Much <S%G1161><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord? <S%G2962><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> Thou Holdest <S%G2192><s%> A Partner, <S%G2844><s%> Receive <S%G4355><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Me; <S%G1691><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> He Wronged <S%G91><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Owes, <S%G3784><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1698><s%> Put To My Account. <S%G1677><s%>

I 1473 P-1NS Paul 3972 N-NSM Wrote 1125 V-AAI-1S 3588 T-DSF It With My Own 1699 S-1DSF Hand; 5495 N-DSF I 1473 P-1NS Will Repay; 661 V-FAI-1S That 2443 CONJ 3361 PRT-N I May Not Say 3004 V-PAS-1S To Thee 4671 P-2DS That 3754 CONJ Even 2532 CONJ Thyself 4572 F-2ASM To Me 3427 P-1DS Thou Owest Also. 4359 V-PAI-2S

Yea, <S%G3483><s%> Brother, <S%G80><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Of Thee 4675 P-2GS May Have Profit 3685 V-2ADO-1S In The 1722 PREP Lord; 2962 N-DSM Refresh 373 V-AAM-2S My 3450 P-1GS 3588 T-APN Bowels 4698 N-APN In The 1722 PREP Lord. 2962 N-DSM

Being Persuaded Of <S%G3982><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5218><s%> Thy Obedience <S%G4675><s%> I Wrote <S%G1125><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Above <S%G5228><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> I May Say <S%G3004><s%> Thou Wilt Do. <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G260><s%> But Withal <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Prepare <S%G2090><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> A Lodging; <S%G3578><s%> <S%G1679><s%> For I Hope <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4335><s%> Your Prayers <S%G5216><s%> I Shall Be Granted <S%G5483><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Epaphras <S%G1889><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fellow Prisoner <S%G4869><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%>
Mark, <S%G3138><s%> Aristarchus, <S%G708><s%> Demas, <S%G1214><s%> Luke, <S%G3065><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4904><s%> My Fellow Workers. <S%G3450><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Be With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4151><s%> Your Spirit. <S%G5216><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Philemon <S%G5371><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Rome, <S%G4516><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Onesimus <S%G3682><s%> A Servant. <S%G3610><s%>
